summary: Roy AJM van der Drift has vast experience in areas of (academic and applied) research, capacity development, proposal writing/design of programmes and intervention models, programme management and monitoring and evaluation. Academic background (social anthropologist PhD) and over thirty years of work experience in Sub Saharan Africa constitute a solid basis for professional expertise in various cultural contexts. Over the past ten years, he has been leading youth employment programmes in design, proposal writing, management and monitoring and evaluation. He has been involved in numerous inclusive development programmes which were essentially responding to market opportunities, and engaging a range of relevant national and local stakeholders and actors in private and public spheres. Currently, he is self-employed as consultant in international cooperation, areas of expertise include (action) research, programme design and management, proposal development.
